recommendations.recommendation: Not MY highway, but strikes me as personal and sincere, which is of course missing from most media, including anime, but is the essence of all art.

anime.description: Various places in the world, trouble is awakening the terror inside every person`s view of life, the distant future of overhead airspace is shown in Highway Jenny. It compares existance with one`s lifetime and afterlife, it contemplates the purity and death of future generations, and to the person who looks at the importance of the choices in their own life, it will be appealing. Source: AnimeNfo

tag.name: ganime
tag.description: Ganime label is for the new style of artistic visual content characterized by pictures, words and music to express the artists’ unique perspectives.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: multi-anime projects
tag.description: Many anime are created as part of larger projects encompassing many shows without direct relation to one another. Normally, there is a specific idea in mind: for example, the http://anidb.net/t4859 [Young Animator Training Project] aims to stimulate the on-the-job training of next-generation professionals of the anime industry, whereas the http://anidb.net/t3763 [World Masterpiece Theatre] aims to animate classical stories from all over the world.
